SELECT ST_AsText(ST_GeomFromText(st_union(the_geom)))
FROM
(SELECT ST_GeomFromText(@wkt_geometry_multiPolygon,4326) as the_geom
UNION ALL
SELECT ST_GeomFromText(@wkt_geometry_multiLineString,4326) as the_geom
UNION ALL
	ST_GeomFromText(@wkt_geometry_multiPoint,4326) as the_geom;

GEOMETRYCOLLECTION(LINESTRING(-482.457612991857 37.7768478012049,-482.446991218995 37.7728992611949),LINESTRING(-482.446991218995 37.7728992611949,-482.440275192785 37.770402644242),LINESTRING(-482.440618515538 37.7826140443376,-482.446991218995 37.7728992611949),LINESTRING(-482.446991218995 37.7728992611949,-482.453836441564 37.7624641525668),POLYGON((-482.424997330236 37.7766442785235,-482.420448303746 37.7699955628342,-482.427658081579 37.7634819555305,-482.424997330236 37.7766442785235)),POLYGON((-482.434782028722 37.7639569254538,-482.428001404332 37.7581892271782,-482.442163467931 37.7571713513862,-482.434782028722 37.7639569254538)))
